page.title: 13Shopping facilities
page.content: Fochabers,being a dormitory village, has a number of supply shops namely three grocers,two butchers,two bakers, a chemist,a fish and chip shop,a clothes retailer,a shoe shop,a fabric and also a woolshop and an electrical supplier. These along with the petrol filling station serve the everyday requirements of the local public. A trip to Elgin would be the norm for the weekly supplies. There are other establishments aimed not so much at the locals but at the passing visitor or the tourist. These include four antique dealers and a reastaurant and gallery selling a variety of souveniers. Many visitors also pay a visit to the Nursery which is a garden centre supplying a wide range of materials for the outdoor and indoor horticulturist.
